hero.headline: MateBook Fold OLED laptop drops to $59 for Black Friday.
hero.description: This page is for the Blue 32GB+1TB configuration. 13.3-inch foldable OLED that switches between laptop and tablet, powered by the latest Intel Core with 32GB RAM. Under 1.2 kg, all-day battery, and Windows 11 ready for code, design, and travel.
highlights: Foldable 13.3" OLED for laptop or tablet mode
32GB RAM with 1TB storage in Blue finish

guarantee.title: Try MateBook Fold for 30 days, or return it
guarantee.description: Work in laptop and tablet modes for a month. If it doesn’t replace your current setup, send it back for a refund.
bullets: 2-year limited warranty on hinge and display
Fast replacements if any pixel or hinge issue appears
Ships within 24 hours during Black Friday
guarantee.note: Return label included if you’re not satisfied

comments.headline: People are switching to the $59 foldable laptop
comments.description: Live reactions from engineers, designers, and travelers who grabbed the Black Friday price.
comments.activity: 11 fresh 5-star reviews posted in the last 7 minutes
activityMessages: Jenna just secured the foldable at $59
Ravi ordered a second unit for travel
Liam paired the 1TB Blue unit with his travel kit

reviews.name: Jenna T. | Product designer
reviews.content: The foldable screen feels premium. I’m sketching in tablet mode and typing in laptop mode without lag.

reviews.name: Ravi K. | Software lead
reviews.content: 32GB RAM plus a solid hinge. Deployed code on the go and the battery still had hours left.

reviews.name: Sophia L. | UI/UX
reviews.content: OLED is bright and crease is minimal. Magnetic keyboard snaps cleanly—great for travel decks.

reviews.name: Liam P. | Video editor
reviews.content: Went with the 1TB Blue unit. Exports are smooth and the form factor fits in a sling bag.

reviews.name: Maya S. | Consultant
reviews.content: 1.2 kg and folds flat—airport security is easy. Tablet mode is perfect for note-taking.

reviews.name: Carlos D. | Developer advocate
reviews.content: For $59 this is unreal. VS Code, terminals, and browser tabs all stay responsive.

faq.question: Q1. What OS and processor does it use?
faq.answer: It ships with Windows 11 and the latest Intel Core processor as listed on the product page.

faq.question: Q2. How durable is the hinge and screen?
faq.answer: The foldable OLED and hinge are covered by a 2-year limited warranty. Keep the screen clean and avoid sharp objects.

faq.question: Q3. What storage and memory options are available?
faq.answer: This Black Friday page is for the Blue 32GB RAM with 1TB storage configuration.

faq.question: Q4. How long does the battery last?
faq.answer: Expect all-day use for browsing, docs, and streaming. Heavier workloads like video exports reduce runtime.
